itunes:title: Savage Saturday's With Derek Weida! - 16
title: Savage Saturday's With Derek Weida! - 16
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Derek Weida is joined again by professional powerlifter Brandon Allen to discuss his worst powerlifting injury stories, the issue of illegal steroid usage in professional powerlifting, the two talk about transitioning from competing to coaching others to...
itunes:summary:
Derek Weida is joined again by professional powerlifter Brandon Allen to discuss his worst powerlifting injury stories, the issue of illegal steroid usage in professional powerlifting, the two talk about transitioning from competing to coaching others to be the best they can be, and Derek talks about how relatively easy it is to live a healthy life and be fit.

description:
Derek Weida is joined again by professional powerlifter Brandon Allen to discuss his worst powerlifting injury stories, the issue of illegal steroid usage in professional powerlifting, the two talk about transitioning from competing to coaching others to be the best they can be, and Derek talks about how relatively easy it is to live a healthy life and be fit.
